query.sql: with us as (select user_id, username from dba_users) select us.username, ash.SESSION_TYPE,us.user_id,decode (session_state,'ON CPU','ON CPU', event) event, count(*) DBTime, round(count(*)*100/sum(count(*)) over (), 2) pctload from V$ACTIVE_SESSION_HISTORY ash, us where 1=1 and sample_time > sysdate - 3/24 -- and SESSION_TYPE <> 'BACKGROUND' and us.user_id = ash.user_id group by us.username, ash.SESSION_TYPE,us.user_id,decode (session_state,'ON CPU','ON CPU', event) order by count(*) desc

Select session_id, count(*) cnt, round(count(*)*100/sum(count(*)) over (), 2) pctload from v$active_session_history where session_state = 'WAITING' and sample_time > sysdate - 3 /24 and session_type != 'BACKGROUND' group by session_id order by pctload desc
Select * from v$active_session_history where session_id = :SESSION_ID and sample_time > sysdate - 3 / 24 order by sample_time desc

Select sql_id, count(*) cnt, round(count(*)*100/sum(count(*)) over (), 2) pctload from v$active_session_history where session_id = :SESSION_ID and sample_time > sysdate - 3 /24 group by sql_id order by pctload desc

Select event, count(*) cnt, round(count(*)*100/sum(count(*)) over (), 2) pctload from v$active_session_history where session_id = :SESSION_ID and sample_time > sysdate - 3 /24 group by event order by pctload desc

Select decode(session_state, 'ON CPU','ON CPU', event) event,sql_id, count(*) cnt, round(count(*)*100/sum(count(*)) over (), 2) pctload from v$active_session_history where session_id = :SESSION_ID and sample_time > sysdate - 3 /24 group by decode(session_state, 'ON CPU','ON CPU', event),sql_id order by pctload desc

WITH pivot_data AS ( SELECT sql_id, plan_hash_value, ct, round(mxdelta,2) mx, round(mndelta,2) mn, round(avdelta) av, WIDTH_BUCKET(delta_in_seconds,mndelta,mxdelta+.1,5) AS bucket , SUBSTR(times,12) max_run_time, SUBSTR(longest_sql_exec_id,12) longest_sql_exec_id FROM ( SELECT sql_id, plan_hash_value, delta_in_seconds, COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY sql_id,plan_hash_value) ct, MAX(delta_in_seconds) OVER (PARTITION BY sql_id,plan_hash_value) mxdelta, MIN(delta_in_seconds) OVER (PARTITION BY sql_id,plan_hash_value) mndelta, AVG(delta_in_seconds) OVER (PARTITION BY sql_id,plan_hash_value) avdelta, MAX(times) OVER (PARTITION BY sql_id) times, MAX(longest_sql_exec_id) OVER (PARTITION BY sql_id,plan_hash_value) longest_sql_exec_id FROM ( SELECT sql_id, sql_exec_id, plan_hash_value, MAX(delta_in_seconds) delta_in_seconds , LPAD(ROUND(MAX(delta_in_seconds),0),10) || ' ' || TO_CHAR(MIN(start_time),'DD.MM.YYYY HH24:MI:SS') || ' ' || TO_CHAR(MAX(end_time),'DD.MM.YYYY HH24:MI:SS') times, LPAD(ROUND(MAX(delta_in_seconds),0),10) || ' ' || TO_CHAR(MAX(sql_exec_id)) longest_sql_exec_id FROM ( SELECT sql_id, sql_exec_id, sql_plan_hash_value plan_hash_value, CAST(sample_time AS DATE) end_time, CAST(sql_exec_start AS DATE) start_time, ((CAST(sample_time AS DATE)) - (CAST(sql_exec_start AS DATE))) * (3600*24) delta_in_seconds FROM V$ACTIVE_SESSION_HISTORY WHERE sql_exec_id IS NOT NULL ) GROUP BY sql_id,sql_exec_id,plan_hash_value ) ) where ct > :min_repeat_executions_filter and mxdelta > :min_elapsed_time ) SELECT * FROM pivot_data PIVOT ( COUNT(*) FOR bucket IN (1,2,3,4,5)) ORDER BY mx DESC,av DESC
select * from v$sqltext_with_newlines where sql_id = :SQL_ID
select * from v$sql_plan where sql_ID = :SQL_ID order by id

display.name: DB Time BY SQL_ID
display.tooltip: Anzeige des SQL, dass die meiste Zeit verbraucht

query.sql: select trunc(sample_time,'MI') sample_time, decode(session_state, 'ON CPU','ON CPU',event) event, sql_id,SQL_PLAN_HASH_VALUE, count(*) cnt, round(count(*)*100/sum(count(*)) over (), 2) pctload from V$ACTIVE_SESSION_HISTORY where 1=1 and sample_time > sysdate - 1/24 and SESSION_TYPE <> 'BACKGROUND' group by trunc(sample_time,'MI'), decode(session_state, 'ON CPU','ON CPU',event), sql_id , SQL_PLAN_HASH_VALUE order by 1 desc
select * from v$sql where sql_id = :SQL_ID
select * from v$sqlstats where sql_id = :SQL_ID

select * from table (SASH_XPLAN.DISPLAY(:SQL_ID,:SQL_PLAN_HASH_VALUE)) /* SELECT SQL_ID, PLAN_HASH_VALUE, CHILD_NUMBER, OPERATION, OPTIONS, OBJECT_OWNER, OBJECT_NAME, OBJECT_TYPE, OPTIMIZER, ID, PARENT_ID, DEPTH, POSITION, SEARCH_COLUMNS, COST, CARDINALITY, BYTES, OTHER_TAG, PARTITION_START, PARTITION_STOP, PARTITION_ID, OTHER, DISTRIBUTION, CPU_COST, IO_COST, TEMP_SPACE, ACCESS_PREDICATES, FILTER_PREDICATES, PROJECTION, TIME, QBLOCK_NAME, REMARKS, ADDRESS, HASH_VALUE, OBJECT_NODE, OBJECT#, OBJECT_ALIAS FROM V$SQL_PLAN where sql_id = :SQL_ID order by sql_id,PLAN_HASH_VALUE, id */

select trunc(sample_time,'HH24') sample_time, sql_id, count(*) cnt, round(count(*)*100/sum(count(*)) over (), 2) pctload from V$ACTIVE_SESSION_HISTORY where 1=1 and sample_time > sysdate - 3/24 and SESSION_TYPE <> 'BACKGROUND' group by trunc(sample_time,'HH24'), sql_id order by pctload desc
select * from v$sqltext_with_newlines where sql_id = :SQL_ID
select * from v$SQL_plan where sql_id = :SQL_ID order by id
Select session_id, count(*) cnt, round(count(*)*100/sum(count(*)) over (), 2) pctload from v$active_session_history where sample_time > sysdate - 1 /24 group by session_id order by pctload desc
Select * from v$active_session_history where session_id = :SESSION_ID and sample_time > sysdate - 3 / 24 order by sample_time desc

Select sql_id,sql_plan_hash_value, count(*) cnt, round(count(*)*100/sum(count(*)) over (), 2) pctload from v$active_session_history where session_id = :SESSION_ID and sample_time > sysdate - 3 /24 group by sql_id,sql_plan_hash_value order by pctload desc
select * from V$SQL where sql_id = :SQL_ID
SELECT * from table(sash_xplan.display(:SQL_ID))

Select event, count(*) cnt, round(count(*)*100/sum(count(*)) over (), 2) pctload from v$active_session_history where session_id = :SESSION_ID and sample_time > sysdate - 3 /24 group by event order by pctload desc

Select decode(session_state, 'ON CPU','ON CPU', event) event,sql_id,sql_plan_hash_value, count(*) cnt, round(count(*)*100/sum(count(*)) over (), 2) pctload from v$active_session_history where session_id = :SESSION_ID and sample_time > sysdate - 3 /24 group by decode(session_state, 'ON CPU','ON CPU', event),sql_id,sql_plan_hash_value order by pctload desc
select * from V$SQL where sql_id = :SQL_ID
SELECT * from table(sash_xplan.display(:SQL_ID))
